channel.title: cocktail on Matt's Musings
channel.description: Recent content in cocktail on Matt's Musings

item.title: Faerie Fire
item.description: Ingredients # 2 oz blue curaçao 1-1/2 oz gin 1 oz orange juice 1 orange wheel for garnish Directions # Combine all ingredients except garnish in an ice-filled shaker and shake well.

item.title: Goblin Grenades
item.description: Ingredients # Shot Glasses # 12 jalapeños 2 tbsp tajin 2 tbsp lime juice Cocktail # 1 lime 2 cups strawberries, hulled and sliced 1/4 cup sugar 1/4 cup water 1 jalapeño, seeded and diced 2 oz lemon vodka Directions # Shot Glasses # Cut of tops of the jalapeños and use a spoon or knife to remove the seeds and whites from inside.

item.title: Red Mana
item.description: Ingredients # 2 oz cinnamon whiskey 2 oz apple whiskey 1 bar spoon grenadine 2 oz club soda 1 Thai chili or jalapeño coin for garnish Directions # Combine whiskeys and grenadine in a shaker with ice and shake.

item.title: Sweet & Sour-cerer
item.description: Ingredients # 1 cup sweet and sour mix 1/3 cup cherry liqueur 1/3 cup white rum 1 lime wheel for garnish Directions # Combine all ingredients except lime wheel in an ice-filled shaker and shake well.
